item.title: HBW April 8 2015 â€“ Pumpkin Spice Milk Stout
item.author: admin@taubindrinks.beer (Dustin Plunkett)
item.description: In this episode of HBW, I talk about my latest beer, and try out a Pumpkin Spice Milk Stout from Belching Beaver Brewery. My current homebrew seems to be stuck at 1.022, which seems pretty high. It started out at 1.069 which would make it 6.17% if my calculations were stop on. I’ve just never had a beer finish that high. I may just keg it and see how it goes, it doesn’t taste overly sweet or anything.
